overview: The football team Staxus is back with another hot movie, this time with no fouls or off sides! Who'd think three rival team players could get along so well? With the first scene starting off with a superb threesome with Denis, Leo and Nick, who don't hesitate in getting each other rock hard and enjoying each others hole! These boys for sure scored a few goals!  For the second scene of this hot twink movie, Joel is also a die hard fan of his local team, and when the chance appears he too wants to get close up to the action with Jerome as he kisses almost every inch of this players body, before getting a good taste of what Jerome has to offer him, leaving him moaning in pleasure and wanting more and more.
title: Footballs!
